name: Community Gallery Region 2024

description:
A collection of 190 rooms (477 screens) submitted by 72 different people as part of the 2024 Leditor Month.

There are no region connections this time, but you play as a slugcat with many assists available to help you on your exploration, should you feel you need it. No rain cycle, no dying, just exploring.
